Description: These lexica contain concreteness and imageability predictions for 77 languages. They are available for download from CLARIN.SI.

Language: Albanian, Bulgarian, English, German, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Serbo-Croatian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swedish
Description: This is a lexicon of emojis available for download from CLARIN.SI and for online browsing through a dedicated environment.

This is a bilingual lexicon that is suitable for language technology applications such as automatic translation, e-learning, multilingual information retrieval, etc. The resource is available for download from the Dutch Language Institute (INT).

Language: Bulgarian, Czech, English, Estonian, French, Hungarian, Romanian, Slovak, Slovenian, Ukrainian
Description: These are morphological lexica available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.
This is a valency lexicon linked to PDT-Vallex, EngVallex and external resources, such as FrameNet, VerbNet, WordNet, etc. The resource is available for download and online browsing through LINDAT.
This is a valency lexicon linked to the parallel PCEDT corpus. The resource is available for download and online browsing through LINDAT.
This is a manually created verb sense lexicon.

Corpus: The LiLaH Emotion Lexicon of Croatian, Dutch and Slovene
Description: This lexicon contains manual translations of the NRC Emotion Lexicon, which encodes the sentiment of a word (positive, negative) and its emotion association (anger, anticipation, disgust, fear, joy, sadness, surprise, trust) for Croatian, Dutch and Slovene with a binary schema. Manual translations were produced by inspecting and correcting the automatic translations from English provided with the original lexicon. While translations to all 14,182 entries are provided for Slovene and Croatian, only translations for the 6,468 entries that have any sentiment or emotion associated with the word are given for Dutch.#SEPThe resource is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.

Language: English, Spanish, Castilian, Bulgarian, Basque, Dutch, Flemish, Czech, Portuguese
Description: This lexicon is used for the automatic translation of specific IT domain expressions and is available for download from CLARIN PORTULAN.
These are morphological lexica available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.
This bilingual lexicon has been compiled for comparative as well as didactic purposes in the on-going VICAV project. The resource is available for download from ARCHE.

Corpus: A machine-readable Persian-English glossary of verbs
Description: This lexicon of single-word verbs in Modern Persian is available for download from ARCHE.
